DOC.brief_summary: This study aim estimate clinical cost impact RV vaccination ( Rotateq® Rotarix® ) among child age less 5 year use insurance claim data commercial plan Medicaid low-income population . The impact incomplete complete RV vaccination also examine , overall stratify age ( e.g. , 6 week 8 month , 8 month onwards ) calendar time RV vaccination ( e.g. , 2006 onward ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Analyze Clinical Cost Impact Complete Incomplete Rotavirus ( RV ) Vaccination
DOC.detailed_description: Insurance claim data MarketScan Commercial Claims Encounters Database { MarketScan Commercial ( 2000-2011 [ Q2 ] ) } MarketScan Multi-State Medicaid Database { Marketscan Medicaid ( 2002-2010 ) } analyze separately ; merge database occur . The claim data extract fully de-identified compliant Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act 1996 ( U.S. ) ( HIPAA ) . For child receive least 1 RV vaccine dose within Advisory Committee Immunization Practices ( ACIP ) -specified vaccination window 6 week 8 month old , observation time divide three RV-vaccinated cohort : RV vaccination 8 month ( i.e. , vaccination window 6 week 8 month old ) ; complete RV vaccination ( i.e. , 8 month old ) ; incomplete RV vaccination ( i.e. , 8 month old ) . For child receive RV vaccine dose within vaccination window , observation time divide four control cohort : historical ( i.e. , RV vaccines available ) unvaccinated on/before 8 month old ; contemporary ( i.e. , RV vaccines available ) unvaccinated on/before 8 month old ; historical unvaccinated 8 month old ; contemporary unvaccinated 8 month old .
DOC.criteria: Continuously enrol birth . ( Note : Due absence birth date insurance claim data , inclusion criterion meet child 's year first enrollment year birth . If , date first enrollment use proxy date birth . ) Received medical pharmacy benefit . Enrolled capitationbased health plan . For MarketScan Commercial , residence state universal vaccination program include RV vaccine RV vaccine inclusion ascertain ( i.e. , Alaska , Idaho , Massachusetts , Maine , North Dakota , New Hampshire , New Mexico , Oregon , Rhode Island , Vermont , Washington , Wisconsin , Wyoming ) . Lost followup RV prior 6 week age .
